languages.text: "Мы уже давно не в системе Райкада, а в голове все еще эхо того, что я перед трансляцией наслушаться успела... Жутко даже подумать, что там происходит сейчас".
"We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."
languages.original_text: "Мы уже давно не в системе Райкада, а в голове все еще эхо того, что я перед трансляцией наслушаться успела... Жутко даже подумать, что там происходит сейчас".

traits.locale_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我们离开莱卡德星系已经有一段时间了，但我的脑海中仍然回荡着逃离之前听到的声音……光是想想那里此刻发生的事情，就令我感到毛骨悚然。”
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: “我们离开莱卡德星系已经有一段时间了，但我的脑海中仍然回荡着逃离之前听到的声音……光是想想那里此刻发生的事情，就令我感到毛骨悚然。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça fait un moment qu'on a quitté le système de Rykad, pourtant j'arrive pas à me sortir de la tête ce que j'ai entendu juste avant le saut... J'ose même pas imaginer ce qu'il doit s'y passer maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: « Ça fait un moment qu'on a quitté le système de Rykad, pourtant j'arrive pas à me sortir de la tête ce que j'ai entendu juste avant le saut... J'ose même pas imaginer ce qu'il doit s'y passer maintenant. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ya dejamos el sistema Rykad hace tiempo, pero mi mente sigue estremeciéndose por lo que oímos antes de saltar... Me da miedo pensar en lo que estará pasando ahora».
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: «Ya dejamos el sistema Rykad hace tiempo, pero mi mente sigue estremeciéndose por lo que oímos antes de saltar... Me da miedo pensar en lo que estará pasando ahora».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ライカド系を脱出してからここしばらく、ワープジャンプに入る前からずっと聞こえてるの…そこで今何が起きているのか、考えるのさえ恐ろしいわ」
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド系を脱出してからここしばらく、ワープジャンプに入る前からずっと聞こえてるの…そこで今何が起きているのか、考えるのさえ恐ろしいわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben das Rykad-System schon eine Weile hinter uns gelassen, und mein Verstand dröhnt trotzdem noch von dem, was ich vor dem Sprung gehört habe ... Allein der Gedanke, was dort nun vorgeht, macht mir Angst."
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben das Rykad-System schon eine Weile hinter uns gelassen, und mein Verstand dröhnt trotzdem noch von dem, was ich vor dem Sprung gehört habe ... Allein der Gedanke, was dort nun vorgeht, macht mir Angst."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi'nden çıkalı epey oldu ama sıçrama öncesinde duyduklarımı bir türlü aklımdan çıkaramıyorum... Şu anda orada yaşananları düşünmesi bile çok korkutucu."
languages.original_text: "We've been out of the Rykad System for a while now, and my mind is still ringing with what I heard before we jumped... It's scary to even think about what's going on there now."

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Sistemi'nden çıkalı epey oldu ama sıçrama öncesinde duyduklarımı bir türlü aklımdan çıkaramıyorum... Şu anda orada yaşananları düşünmesi bile çok korkutucu."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
